scheme_name: Scheme for assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation: Assistance for Skill Development
details: The "Scheme for Assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation" is an umbrella scheme launched by the Industries and Mines Department, Gujarat under the Gujarat Industrial Policy. Effective from August 7th, 2020 to August 6th, 2025, it aims to drive economic growth by generating jobs, fostering competition, and introducing next-gen solutions.
benefits: Financial Assistance: Startups can receive up to ₹1,00,000/- for skill development training programs on a reimbursement basis.
Skill Enhancement: Focused training to improve soft skills, managerial skills, marketing skills, and financing skills.
eligibility: Any individual or group of individuals with an innovative idea or concept, recommended by an approved Nodal Institution, is eligible.
The scheme is open to startups in any sector or branch of science, technology, engineering, agriculture, healthcare, etc., making it sector-agnostic.
Startups availing benefits under the Student Startup and Innovation Policy (SSIP) are also eligible.
exclusions: Entities formed by splitting or restructuring an existing business are not considered startups under this scheme.
Startups availing benefits under other startup schemes of the Government of Gujarat are ineligible.
application_process: Online registration and application through the startup portal
Fill in the details on the Common Application Form
Apply for the scheme and upload required documents
documents_required: Informative document of the training program (brochure, leaflet, letter from host organization etc.)
Receipt of fees paid for participating in the training program
Certificate of completion of training program, clearly indicating name of the participants (founder/co-founders of startup)
